title: Strengthening Leadership Competencies in Practice: Gamification-Based Education for Online Collaborative Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can solve science simulation problems with 80% accuracy by collaborating with team members in over three gamification activities
Learners can perform open communication at least four times while completing team projects using online collaboration tools (chat, shared whiteboard, etc.)
Learners can achieve over 4 points on a 5-point team cohesion index scale through gamification elements (leaderboards, reward systems)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
